holidays.title: National Selfie Day
holidays.description: Time to find the perfect angle, try out that new filter, and freshen up your socials!

holidays.title: Summer Solstice
holidays.description: On the Summer Solstice the sun stays in the sky the longest it will all year.

holidays.title: World Day of Music
holidays.description: Even if we can't play instruments, or sing, somehow, we can connect with rhythms and melodies.

holidays.title: Andean New Year
holidays.description: Today is all about celebrating culture as is done by the people of the Andes region.

holidays.title: Aymara New Year
holidays.description: Learn more about the Aymara New Year and its rituals, which transcend space, time, and history.

holidays.title: Aymara New Year Day
holidays.description: Get set to celebrate Aymara New Year's Day with our great tips and information.

holidays.title: Canada's National Indigenous Peoples Day
holidays.description: Today we recognize the many achievements of the country's Indigenous peoples, and celebrates cultures and traditions.

holidays.title: Go Skateboarding Day
holidays.description: Unleash your sporting side as we celebrate one of the most popular activities across the globe.

holidays.title: International Day of the Celebration of the Solstice
holidays.description: Get informed about solstice celebrations around the world with our detailed article.

holidays.title: International Day of Yoga
holidays.description: Get your gear and start stretching! We’re celebrating yoga’s amazing benefits this International Day of Yoga.

holidays.title: International Surfing Day
holidays.description: Hang onto your surfboard as we dive into the fun facts about International Surfing Day.

holidays.title: Martyrs' Day in Togo
holidays.description: Honor the memories of all sons and daughters of the land in your individual ways.

holidays.title: National Aboriginal Day
holidays.description: Learn about the contributions of the indigenous peoples of Canada with our detailed article.

holidays.title: National Arizona Day
holidays.description: Whether you’re local or not, get ready to celebrate as we appreciate the beauty of Arizona.

holidays.title: National Cookie Dough Day
holidays.description: Indulge your cravings with some cookie dough on National Cookie Dough Day.

holidays.title: National Day of the Gong
holidays.description: Ring a gong, ring a gong! It’s National Day of the Gong.

holidays.title: National Daylight Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Spend an extra hour outside on National Daylight Appreciation Day.

holidays.title: National Dog Party Day
holidays.description: You’re invited to the woof woof party of the year — be sure to bring a friend!

holidays.title: National Peaches and Cream Day
holidays.description: It’s that time of the year where we indulge in this traditional and delicious summertime dessert.

holidays.title: National Seashell Day
holidays.description: You know it’s summer when you can sink your feet in the sand and admire seashells.

holidays.title: National Smoothie Day
holidays.description: Mix your favorite sweet juices and express your own personal take on the taste of summer.

holidays.title: National Wagyu Day
holidays.description: Savor the exquisite flavors and melt-in-your-mouth experience of Wagyu.

holidays.title: National Yard Games Day
holidays.description: Get some chilled beverages, gather your friends, head to the yard, and play some yard games.

holidays.title: Shades for Migraine
holidays.description: Grab your boldest pair of sunglasses, and show that you care about this worthy campaign.

holidays.title: Siding Check Day
holidays.description: Regular siding maintenance protects your home's structure and appearance year-round.

holidays.title: World Giraffe Day
holidays.description: Join us this World Giraffe Day as we dedicate the longest day to the tallest animal!

holidays.title: World Humanist Day
holidays.description: A day to celebrate and raise awareness about humanism, humanist principles, and its global impact!

holidays.title: World Hydrography Day
holidays.description: Put on your diving gear and join hydrographers as they unravel the mysterious topography that’s underwater.

holidays.title: World MotorCycle Day
holidays.description: Become a part of this enthusiastic activity and see how you develop a sense of freedom.

holidays.title: Rebecca Black’s Birthday

holidays.title: Sofie Dossi’s Birthday
